name: Razor
title: The Lightning Revenant
lore: A being of pure electricity, Razor guards the Underscape, punishing those who would escape death.

plasmaField.name: Plasma Field
plasmaField.description: Releases a ring of plasma that expands outward, damaging enemies based on distance.

staticLink.name: Static Link
staticLink.description: Creates a link that drains damage from an enemy and gives it to Razor.

stormSurge.name: Storm Surge
stormSurge.description: Grants Razor bonus movement speed and a chance to release lightning.

eyeOfTheStorm.name: Eye of the Storm
eyeOfTheStorm.description: Summons a storm that strikes the lowest health enemy nearby, reducing their armor.

25: Eye of the Storm Strikes Two Targets
